result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Order appointing counsel Atty Mark Lawton at $100/ hour with payment plan of $100/ month with payment plan.

9:13 AM Defendant Nicholas John Kosterman in court. Defendant requested court appointed attorney, He did not qualify for public defender. Court appointed Atty Mark Lawton at $100.00/ hour with a payment plan of $100/ month commencing on 12/1/2022. 9:17 AM
Fax from SPD office - defendant is not eligible
Indigency hearing on October 31, 2022 at 09:15 am.

records.addlTxt:
Pre- trial 11/29/22 at 9:50 AM
Return date 1/12/23 at 9:00 AM

Standard misdemeanor conditions, Not possess or consume controlled substances without a valid Rx. Not possess drug paraphernalia. Not operate motor vehicle without a valid license. May not posses firearms. Must turn over firearms to Portage Police Department. No unsupervised contact with L.E., must be accompanied by an adult over the age of 18 years.

1:25 PM Defendant Nicholas John Kosterman appeared by video, in custody from the Columbia County jail.  Attorney Allison J Borsheim appeared by video for Nicholas John Kosterman.  Prosecuting attorney Margeret Anne Sorrentino appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. waived reading of criminal complaint, right to attorney recited, $1,000.00 signature bond, standard misdemeanor conditions, Not operate motor vehicle without a valid license. Not possess or consume controlled substances without a valid Rx. Not possess drug paraphernalia. No possession or consumption of alcoholic beverages. Not posses firearms, All firearms to be turned over to the Portage Police Department. No unsupervised contact with L.K., Must be accompanied by an adult (over the age of 18 years) at all times. 1:35 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 09:50 am.
Return date scheduled for January 12, 2023 at 09:00 am.
